* An interface for customizing the eglCreateWindowSurface and eglDestroySurface calls. *

* This interface must be implemented by clients wishing to call * {@link GLSurfaceView#setEGLWindowSurfaceFactory(EGLWindowSurfaceFactory)}

methods.name: EGLSurface createWindowSurface(EGL10 egl, EGLDisplay display, EGLConfig config, Object nativeWindow)
methods.comment: *  @return null if the surface cannot be constructed.
